name: orange-hill-engineering
description: AI-powered development tools for Laravel, Next.js, and Chrome extensions. Includes 23 specialized agents, 19 commands, and 11 skills. Derived from Compound Engineering by Kieran Klaassen.

hooks.command: python3 -c "import json,sys,re;d=json.loads(sys.stdin.read());cmd=d.get('tool_input',{}).get('command','');patterns=[r'rm\s+-rf\s+/',r'rm\s+-rf\s+~',r'rm\s+-rf\s+\$HOME',r'rm\s+-rf\s+\.\.',r'rm\s+-rf\s+\*',r'rm\s+-rf\s+\.',r'rm\s+-r\s+-f\s+/',r'rm\s+--recursive.*/'];blocked=any(re.search(p,cmd,re.I)for p in patterns);print(json.dumps({'decision':'block','reason':'Dangerous rm command blocked'}if blocked else{'decision':'approve'}))"
